description: An unimpressive, everyday man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.
keywords: real time,vigilantism,character repeats someone else's dialogue,dark comedy,man murders a woman
name: Nick of Time

review.name: Totally underrated film
review.reviewBody: I went to see this movie in the theater and I have to say that it is one of the most underrated films I have ever seen. This movie received a lot of bad press when it was released but I don't see how it was justified. The story is great and it makes you nervous watching it unfold. You will know what I am talking about if you see it. Christopher Walken gives another great performance as the "policeman" as he calls himself. Walken's voice is one of the best in the business. I highly recommend this movie if you want to be entertained with a great suspenseful film.
